comment: She is very nice and will work with you if you have any issues. She has a lot of energy and expects you to give 100% effort, but she is never ugly about it. Had her for marching and concert band. In concert band she gets very annoyed when people use their phones, but I think that's fair.

I had Ms Rudy for marching band, for her first year as an Assistant Band Director. Dr T and Ms Rudy are a great pair of teachers. I could tell they put in a lot of work to make our season great. Ms Rudy wrote our show drill and lead some of our practices. She is very approachable and kind.
